fulltext:
MINH NGUYEN DANG 
Senior Front End Developer 
SUMMARY 
• 
I have over 4 years of experience working in software developing industry. I am specialized in Angular, ReactJS 
as front-end and .NET as back-end. 
• 
I have fluent English and is comfortable working with culturally-diverse or remote team. I am very familiar 
with Agile and scrum-based projects. 
• 
I always welcome to catch up with new technologies and need short time to get familiar with them. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
• 
Web Development: HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Javascript, jQuery, AngularJS 1 + 2 + 4 + 5, ReatcJS. 
• 
Backend: .NET MVC 
• 
Cloud: Window Azure. 
• 
Mobile Development: Hybrid Application (Cordova, Ionic framework, Monaca framework). 
• 
Database: MS SQL Server, MySQL, SQLite, SAP HANA RDBMS, MongoDB. 
• 
Programming Tools: Visual Studio Code, Visual Studio, Jira, SVN, GIT. 
• 
Platforms: MS Windows, MAC OS. 
EDUCATION & PROFESSIONAL CERTIFICATION 
• 
FPT University – Engineer degree of Software Engineering (2011 – 2015) 
• 
MCSA: Web Application – Certified 2017 from Microsoft (link: 
https://www.youracclaim.com/badges/61be1ecd-a014-446c-84c4-54d1908a30c4) 
• 
Exam 486: Developing ASP.NET MVC Web Applications from Microsoft (Link: 
https://www.youracclaim.com/badges/40991391-fd15-4652-b0ae-1005417f4b33) 
• 
Exam 480: Programming in HTML5 with JavaScript and CSS3 from Microsoft (Link: 
https://www.youracclaim.com/badges/e0e11c73-4105-45d7-bf64-e64933806e0f) 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
November 2017 -  Current 
Senior Front End Developer 
Project:  MxExchange 
Project Description: 
• 
Developing a responsive website to exchange crypto currency. 
Industry Domain: Block-chain 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Create skeleton for front end project (used Angular 5). 
• 
Review code for members 
• 
Directly report to Malaysia customer every day. 
• 
Build HTML pages based on UI designed. 
• 
Develop functions and integrate with back-end services. 
Team size: 14 members 
Technologies used: Angular 5, HTML5, CSS3, .NET core 2.0, SQL etc. 
Company: Agmo Studio 
April 2017 – Oct 2017 
Full-stack Developer 
Project: DigitalHub - Timesheet 
Project Description: 
• 
Developing an internal tool for logging work and export to excel with correct format for CBA Solution 
Industry Domain: Banking 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Build HTML page based on UI design. 
• 
Develop back-end using .NET MVC Api. 
• 
Develop functions and integrate with back-end services. 
Team size: 8 members 
Technologies used: Angular 4, HTML5, CSS3, Jquery, Webpack, .NET, SQL etc. 
Company: FSOFT Ho Chi Minh (Onsite at Commonwealth bank) 
Jan 2017 – April 2017  
Front-end Developer 
Project: Back office console (BOC) 
Project Description: 
• 
Developing an internal tool for admin to manage an internet banking system for Commonwealth Bank in 
Indonesia 
Industry Domain: Banking 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Build HTML page based on UI design. 
• 
Develop functions and integrate with back-end services. 
Team size: 10 members 
Technologies used: ReactJS, Redux, HTML5, CSS3, Jquery, Webpack, etc. 
Company: FSOFT Ho Chi Minh  (Onsite at Commonwealth bank) 
Nov 2016 – Jan 2017  
Mobile Developer 
Project: iVision – Hybrid mobile app (iOS & Android) 
Project Description: 
• 
Developing an internal social network for AirBus to share success and vision for members. 
Industry Domain: Plan 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Build HTML page based on UI design. 
• 
Develop functions and integrate with back-end services. 
Team size: 10 members 
Technologies used: Ionic Framework 2, AngularJS 2, HTML5, Typescript, SCSS, etc. 
Company: FPT Software Ho Chi Minh 
Sep 2016 – Oct 2016  
Hybrid Developer 
Project: MPD – Hybrid mobile app (iOS & Android) 
Project Description: 
• 
This application is a Mobile Dashboard Performance on iPhone and iPad supporting the daily work of RWE’s 
eligible employees. To be more specific, the application is designed to allow user to subscribe locations and 
blocks from which user want to receive notifications whenever an event happens. 
Industry Domain: Energy, Plant Maintenance 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Build HTML page based on UI design. 
• 
Develop functions and integrate with back-end services. 
Team size: 8 members 
Technologies used: Ionic Framework, AngularJS, HTML5, SASS, Cordova. 
Company: FPT Software Ho Chi Minh 
Apr 2016 – Aug 2016 
Developer 
Project: V5SDA– Hybrid mobile app (iOS & Android) 
Project Description: 
• 
Developing an app for managing manifest about industrial disposal in Japan. 
Industry Domain: Industrial disposal 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Learn business of exhausting in Japan. 
• 
Develop functions and integrate with current back-end services. 
• 
Modified back-end services with .NET. 
Team size: 18 members 
Technologies used: Monaca Framework, AngularJS, JQuery, HTML5, Cordova, .NET MVC 5, Entity framework 6. 
Company: Pascalia Asia Vietnam 
Jan 2016 – Mar 2016  
Mobile Developer 
Project: Safety Walk – Hybrid mobile app (iOS & Android) 
Project Description: 
• 
Developing an app for Auditors checking status of stations and sending report to the data center. 
Industry Domain: Energy, Plant Maintenance 
Responsibilities: 
• 
Build HTML page based on UI design. 
• 
Develop functions and integrate with back-end services. 
Team size: 8 members 
Technologies used: Ionic Framework, AngularJS, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, Cordova. 
Company: FPT Software Ho Chi Minh 
May 2015 – Dec 2015  
Web Developer 
Project: Video Metrics - .NET framework 
Project Description: 
• 
A movie rating system (web back-end, mobile app for raters and organizer) that allow audiences globally to do 
real-time rating for movies broadcasted by an International Broadcaster based in Germany. 
Industry Domain: Broadcaster, Media. 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Develop back-end functions for the movie rating system. 
Team size: 14 members 
Technologies used: MVC5, Entity Framework 6, HTML5, Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery, Ajax, Azure Cloud. 
Company: FPT Software Ho Chi Minh 
Dec 2014 – May 2015  
Web Developer 
Project:  MathHub 
Project Description: 
• 
A social network for Math lovers. People can share their questions about Math and get answers from other 
user. They also can make friends and chat with others user. 
Industry Domain: Math, Social Network. 
Responsibilities: 
- 
Create system diagrams 
- 
Develop back-end functions for the Math system. 
- 
Design Mockup UI. 
Team size: 6 members 
Technologies used: MVC5, Entity Framework 6, HTML5, Bootstrap, Javascript, jQuery, Ajax.
